NEW YORK – Don't call him "Teeny Todd." 
After three stripped-down revivals – most recently off-Broadway in 2017, set in an immersive pie shop – "Sweeney Todd" swings his razor once again on the Gre… [+3881 chars]

articles.title: Native activists accuse Hollywood producer of faking Cherokee background - Fox News
articles.description: A Native American watchdog group recently accused Hollywood producer Heather Rae of lying about her Cherokee heritage for profit according to the New York Post.
articles.content:
